name: bcsiHIL

-| wcel(c1, chba)
body.pretty:
⊢ (abs `(c0[.ih]c1))[≤]((normh ` c0)[×](normh ` c1))
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >)
⊣ normh =(normCV ` < < +h, .h >, normh >)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` < < +h, .h >, normh >)
⊣ < < +h, .h >, normh > ∈ CPreHilOLD
⊣ c0 ∈ ~H
⊣ c1 ∈ ~H
